metadata.Description: Cooperatives that enable individuals or communities to collectively own and manage energy resources.

entities.Description: Agencies that promote and support the development and use of renewable energy sources.
The process of capturing and storing energy for later use.

relations.Description: Energy cooperatives address energy poverty by providing affordable and sustainable energy solutions to underserved communities.
relations.Subject: energy cooperatives

relations.Description: Energy cooperatives employ renewable energy technologies to generate clean and sustainable energy for their members.

relations.Description: Energy cooperatives collaborate with local governments to implement renewable energy projects and promote sustainable energy practices.

relations.Description: Energy cooperatives support community development by investing in local renewable energy projects and creating job opportunities.
relations.Subject: energy cooperatives

relations.Description: Energy cooperatives administer feed-in tariff programs to incentivize the production of renewable energy by their members.
relations.Subject: energy cooperatives

relations.Description: Energy cooperatives measure energy consumption to identify energy-saving opportunities and promote energy efficiency.

relations.Description: Energy cooperatives align with the Sustainable Development Goals by promoting clean energy access and reducing carbon emissions.
relations.Subject: energy cooperatives

relations.Description: Energy cooperatives are an instance of community-owned renewable energy projects that empower communities to take control of their energy sources.
